name: C# Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of C# programming, including syntax, variables, control structures, and object-oriented programming through theory and practical tasks.

lessons.title: Introduction to C#
lessons.content:
C# is a modern, object-oriented programming language developed by Microsoft.

Key points:
- Used in .NET applications.
- Strongly typed language.
- Supports OOP principles like inheritance and polymorphism.

quizQuestions.questionText: Who developed the C# programming language?
quizQuestions.options:
A) Google
B) Microsoft
C) Oracle
D) Apple

quizQuestions.questionText: What type of language is C#?
quizQuestions.options:
A) Scripting
B) Strongly typed
C) Markup
D) Query

quizQuestions.questionText: Which framework is C# primarily associated with?
quizQuestions.options:
A) Django
B) .NET
C) Spring
D) Ruby on Rails

lessons.title: Variables and Data Types

quizQuestions.questionText: Which data type is used to store whole numbers in C#?
quizQuestions.options:
A) string
B) int
C) double
D) bool

quizQuestions.questionText: What is the default value of a bool variable in C#?
quizQuestions.options:
A) true
B) false
C) null
D) 0

lessons.title: Control Structures

quizQuestions.questionText: Which keyword is used for a conditional statement in C#?
quizQuestions.options:
A) switch
B) if
C) for
D) while

quizQuestions.questionText: What does the 'break' keyword do in a loop?
quizQuestions.options:
A) Pauses the loop
B) Exits the loop
C) Skips one iteration
D) Restarts the loop
